Interface GradeDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
GradeDAOPostgres
public interface GradeDAO
Interface for performing data access operations related to grades. Provides methods for creating, deleting, and retrieving grades.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Grade
    createGrade(int id_user_graded, int id_service_graded, int friendliness, int rapidity, int quality, float avg_grade)
    Creates a new grade in the database.
    Grade
    deleteGrade(int id_grade)
    Deletes an existing grade from the database.
    List<Grade>
    getAllGrades(int id_user)
    Retrieves all grades for a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • createGrade

      Grade createGrade(int id_user_graded, int id_service_graded, int friendliness, int rapidity, int quality, float avg_grade)
      Creates a new grade in the database.
      Parameters:
      id_user_graded - The ID of the user being graded.
      id_service_graded - The ID of the service being graded.
      friendliness - The friendliness grade.
      rapidity - The rapidity grade.
      quality - The quality grade.
      avg_grade - The average grade.
      Returns:
      The created Grade object.

    • deleteGrade

      Grade deleteGrade(int id_grade)
      Deletes an existing grade from the database.
      Parameters:
      id_grade - The ID of the grade to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted Grade object.

    • getAllGrades

      List<Grade> getAllGrades(int id_user)
      Retrieves all grades for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      id_user - The ID of the user for whom grades are retrieved.
      Returns:
      The retrieved Grade object.
